General_Description: '''Target of Choice - Athenian Strategoi''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[Strategos|Strategoi]] must be taken out to weaken Athens."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and killed a number of Athenian strategoi all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[High Ranks of War]] and [[Killing Order Givers]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
